Question
========
What is strain?

Answerlist
----------
* The stress per unit length.
* The same as force.
* The ratio of the change in length to the original length.
* The applied force per cross-sectional area.

Solution
========
Strain is the ratio of the change in length to the original length. 

$$\text{strain} = \frac{\Delta L}{L_0}$$
